channel.title: The New Quiz U Have To Take Before Posting
channel.description: What do you think about it?

item.title: The New Quiz U Have To Take Before Posting
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

wall of fir:

Kinda cool, but why do we have to know what a cat is?

Wtf, you’re back?

Read full topic

item.title: The New Quiz U Have To Take Before Posting
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“Silver Lining, post:31, topic:64295”]I put Pd’s mother on that one…[quote author=Gotta Catch Them All link=topic=93223.msg971535#msg971535 date=1173059507]

Honestly, I thought it wasn’t necessary. I got an idea, look in the General site discussions section of this forum to see what it is.

Idea is explained here.

Ok, this is the second time you’ve posted that thread with your idea… If people think its a good idea they will post on it themselves… They don’t need you shoving it right under their noses.

Stop complaining. I only said it on two threads, the threads that are related to the topic. I know what I am doing. I haven’t been warned like you, have I?

I was warned for stereotyping emos without a single curse word in my post (if memory serves) by Pwnd the emo mod… I’d say my warning really doesn’t mean shit.
[/quote]I believe that is a direct violation of the rules, if memory serves? Your warning does not mean shit: it’s from Pwnd a nd Pwnd is leet.[/quote]

No… Its not and No… He isn’t.

Read full topic
item.source: The New Quiz U Have To Take Before Posting

item.title: The New Quiz U Have To Take Before Posting
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“xxhellfirexx, post:29, topic:64295”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=93223.msg970639#msg970639 date=1173051347]

What was the point with it?

At your most learn to use google?

That is the point, to weed out users that are not willing to help themselves.
[/quote]

How about if a person gets a question wrong?[/quote]

Then it tells them they got x questions wrong and they need to do it again. I got a question wrong(it said a dolluchiswhatyamecall it is what: A. Owl, B. ???, C. Monkey and D. Pd’s mother. Google said owl monkey so I put owl but it was a monkey.)

Read full topic

item.title: The New Quiz U Have To Take Before Posting
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Zach1188:

Personally, I think users should only be allowed two attempts per day.

There are 10 questions, and most of them are common sense. 2 a lifetime should be more than enough.

Read full topic

item.title: The New Quiz U Have To Take Before Posting
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

leader:

Stop complaining. I only said it on two threads, the threads that are related to the topic. I know what I am doing. I haven’t been warned like you, have I?

Oh, snap! Because being warned is so objective, right? It really depends on the mod and the user. Many of the cm, mods, admins can post whatever shit they like, while junior members can be muted for a similar thing. It really is counterproductive and is no grounds to judge other people.

Read full topic
item.source: The New Quiz U Have To Take Before Posting

item.title: The New Quiz U Have To Take Before Posting
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

1 dum taco:

what happends if u fail ? anyone know?

Aparently you just get to try again and again until you pass;

[quote=“wonderguy6, post:12, topic:64144”][quote author=lothy link=topic=92961.msg968623#msg968623 date=1173012594]
What happens if you do fail the test?
[/quote]
You cant.

It gives you how many things are wrong and you have to keep trying. my step brother did it LOLS![/quote]

Read full topic
